alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:37PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Elko County through 315 PM PDT... At 236 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles west of Wendover to 16 miles south of West Wendover to 22 miles northwest of Ibapah. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Wendover, Wendover, White Horse Pass and Silver Zone Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
